draw() - Method in class renderer.Renderer
This draws the whole game by iterating through each tile in the game and drawing the tiles as well objects on top of those tiles.
drawLeft() - Method in class renderer.PolygonBlock
Draws the left polygon of the PolygonBlock.
drawObjects(Tile, PolygonBlock) - Method in class renderer.Renderer
Draws the objects on top of the the tile given and the position of object is determined by the position of the tile's PolygonBlock.
drawPlayer() - Method in class renderer.Renderer
Draws the player by adding the player image (in respect of the player's direction) into the root.
drawPolygonBlock(int, int) - Method in class renderer.Renderer
Draws the tile (PolygonBlock) for each tile and stores it in the tile's field.
drawRight() - Method in class renderer.PolygonBlock
